text: Empa kamorao ho mona ha ho ka tsebahala hore bobeli ba entse sebe, lumellang ba babeli ba leloko ho nka sebaka sa bona, le ba lumelle ho ikana ka Allah hore: “Ruri bopaki ba rona bo nepahetse ho feta bopaki ba bona, ha re’a feteletsa ‘nete, hobane Ruri re ka ts’oanela hoba har’a baetsa-libe.”
